Text:
Hi vonRicht, appreciate your uploads. T2 looked really great, and american gangster was also very good.

Do you plan on releasing the entire bond 50 collection? I was also wondering if you will be releasing the matrix trilogy?

At some point in the future I will be releasing The Matrix Trilogy.

Regarding James Bond then I will release all the Bond films with Sean Connery. At least for starters.
Thanks, just wanted to check regarding the 007s before committing to download.

The sound on this stops at around 13min using kmplayer. But is ok using powerdvd.

What player do you recommend for videos vonRicht?
